dozen.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Chris, Helen, and half a dozen others went on holiday together.
A dozen or so  (=about 12) cars were parked near the entrance.
The number of deaths has risen to more than two dozen.
dozen.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: We collected dozens and dozens of shells on the beach.
I’ve heard this story a dozen times before.
dozen.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: More than a dozen managers have come and gone.
The extension to a wider base has won them at least half a dozen (=six) valuable new clients.
